sentences.english: Nonstate actors, ranging from unofficial governing entities to terrorist organizations, will grow, particularly in weak states.
sentences.chinese: 非国家行为体将会增多，特别是在国力衰弱的国家。

sentences.english: Meeting name 《the controversy Sung Dynasty Cu Ju and citizen strength strong relation 》 .
sentences.chinese: 会议名称《议宋朝蹴鞠与国力强盛关系》。

sentences.english: In this period, seemingly, the world was united, and the national power was strong.
sentences.chinese: 这一时期，从表面上看，天下统一，国力强盛。

sentences.english: The Getty Images exhibition is at the Movieum of London in County Hall.
sentences.chinese: 该图片在伦敦展览馆国力大厅展出，无图片介绍。

sentences.english: Adds Anlushan Rebellion's reason, causes Tang Dynasty's national strength to decline day after day.
sentences.chinese: 加之安史之乱的原因，使唐朝的国力日渐衰退。

sentences.english: In AD 80, the Roman Empire was on top of the world.
sentences.chinese: 公元80年，罗马帝国的国力正处于世界颠峰。

sentences.english: The definition and realization of national interests depend on a country's over-all national strength.
sentences.chinese: 国家利益的界定与实现取决于一国的综合国力。

sentences.english: China’s comprehensive national strength has further strengthened and people's livelihood has further improved.
sentences.chinese: 中国的综合国力进一步增强，人民生活进一步改善。

sentences.english: About ten years later, the resources of the country was used up so Sui Dynasty died out.
sentences.chinese: 十几年后，国力耗尽，隋朝也随之灭亡了。

sentences.english: China's social productivity and comprehensive national strength have achieved historic leaps and bounds.
sentences.chinese: 中国的社会生产力和综合国力实现了历史性跨越。

sentences.english: The comprehensive national strength of China enhanced, and people's living stander improved.
sentences.chinese: 中国的综合国力进一步增强，人民生活进一步改善。

sentences.english: Education can enhance the power of the country and improve the national quality .
sentences.chinese: 教育可以增强国力并提高国民素质。

sentences.english: Bob: It illustrates that Chinese comprehensive power has been growing up.
sentences.chinese: 这证明了中国的综合国力在提升啊。
